bio.title: About Me
bio.description: I'm a backend developer from Russia with 1+ year of commercial experience in building Telegram bots, web apps, and fullstack solutions. Skilled in Python (FastAPI, aiogram), JavaScript/TypeScript (Node.js, Express, Nest, React), Docker, Redis, and Postgres. Passionate about clean code and pixel art.
